data.title: Bridgeville, DE population
data.meta_description: Population of Bridgeville town, Delaware state, Sussex County. Population density, maps, changes. Estimated population for 2024: 2,652
data.text:
Population of Bridgeville, DE

Last official estimated population of Bridgeville town (Sussex County**, Delaware state) was 2,205 (year 2014)[1]. This was 0.001% of total US population and 0.23% of total Delaware state population. Area of Bridgeville town is 4.6 mi² (=12 km²)[6], in this year population density was 476.04 p/mi². If population growth rate would be same as in period 2010-2014 (+1.86%/yr), Bridgeville town population in 2024 would be 2,652*.

• Ellendale town 11.3 mi, 58°

• Bethel town 10.7 mi, 184°

• Galestown town 12.8 mi, 208°

• Farmington town 10.1 mi, 7°

Sources, notices

*Calculated by population.us from last known population growth rate, not official data.

**Some cities are placed on more than one county. Only 1 county is shown.

[1] Cities and Towns (Incorporated Places and Minor Civil Divisions) 2014, archived from the original, retrieved 02/23/2016

[2] City and Town Intercensal Estimates (2000-2010), archived from the original, retrieved 02/23/2016
